answerText: Iceland[10] This Laxness novel tells of Steinar who gifts his family's white pony to a king and then moves to the Mormon Zion of Utah.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 8 | 11 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In a novel titled [This country's] Bell, Jon Hreggvidsson is a farmer who is convicted of the murder of an executioner. For 10 points each: [10] Name this country that was the home of Halldor Laxness, the only winner of the Nobel Prize in Literature from this country.
